tests.name: Autograde
tests.setup: sudo apt-get install gcc-multilib; sudo -H pip3 install pytest; sudo -H pip3 install ply;  sudo -H pip3 install lark;   sudo -H pip3 install lark-parser;  chmod u+x pyyc; sudo apt-get install libatlas3-base; sudo apt-get install graphviz; sudo -H pip3 install graphviz
tests.run: python3 --version; python3.10 --version; cd tests; pytest --pyyctests autograde
